memory_verse.label: Today's Bread
memory_verse.text: “I came to send fire on the earth, and how I wish it were already kindled!” (Luke 12:49)

devotion.label: Devotion
devotion.text:
Our loving Lord fulfills our desires, whether small or great, with grace and compassion. But have we ever stopped to ask, as to what He desires?  Just as parents joyfully give their children what they ask for, yet often the children fail to find out the desires and longing of their parents.

We should know clearly the desires of our Lord; and the things He hates.  What are the desires of our Lord?

conclusion.label: Verse for further meditation
text: Verse for further meditation: “To the one who overcomes, I will grant the right to sit with Me on My throne, just as I also overcame and sat down with My Father on His throne.” (Revelation 3:21)
